github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.lessons_learned: Latency spikes often related to database connection pooling - need to monitor closely
github_commits.bug_related: This commit addresses a potential root cause of the latency spikes. Further investigation needed to confirm direct correlation.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added metrics dashboard for scaling performance
github_commits.lessons_learned: Real-time monitoring is crucial for proactive scaling
github_commits.bug_related: Monitoring will help identify spikes and trigger alerts.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Prioritize scaling improvements for the staging environment.
slack_conversations.warnings: Latency spikes appearing - need immediate attention.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Users reporting slow response times - investigate database performance.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Scaling - Sprint 3
jira_tickets.description: Enhance application architecture to handle increased user load.  Optimize database queries, implement caching, and explore horizontal scaling options. Address latency spikes.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Directly related to the observed latency spikes - root cause analysis required.

confluence_docs.title: Scaling Architecture & Best Practices - Sprint 3
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about Scaling - Optimizing database connections, implementing caching strategies, and considering horizontal scaling. Monitoring is key to proactive scaling.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel

google_docs.title: Sprint 3 Planning - Scaling
google_docs.content: Meeting notes about Scaling -  Decided to focus on database optimization and caching.  Rahul and Priya to collaborate. Action item:  Arjun to investigate database performance.
action_items: Arjun to analyze database query performance
google_docs.bug_mentions: Latency spikes - key issue to resolve during scaling efforts.
